rdfs:Class.rdfs:label: Objet fabriqué
Ανθρωπογενές Αντικείμενο
Künstlicher Gegenstand
Рукотворный Объект
Human-Made Object
Objeto Fabricado
人造物件
rdfs:Class.rdfs:comment: This class comprises physical objects purposely created by human activity. No assumptions are made as to the extent of modification required to justify regarding an object as man-made. For example, an inscribed piece of rock or a preserved butterfly are both regarded as instances of E22 Human-Made Object.
